CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Improved alert filtering
CurrentVersion.description: The update offers analysts and investigators the ability to filter out any activity that was already reviewed in a past alert for a user so they can focus their review on new activities that may lead to a data security incident. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Visualization of cumulative exfiltration trends
CurrentVersion.description: When investigating an alert, admins can leverage the activity scatter plot to visualize a historical timeline of activity types, risk scores, and the sequence of events. To help organizations better visualize the growth of exfiltration over time, this new trend chart will show a user’s cumulative data exfiltration activity as it relates to other key signals like resignation date. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Content Pane for SharePoint Pages and News.
CurrentVersion.description: The content pane is a new place for relevant panes that help authors create their publications. With the introduction of this centralized location, a new toolbox will help authors quickly browse and add content to create rich and engaging pages. The content pane will include additional panes such as configuration tools, design ideas, etc. Within Viva Amplify, the content pane is also used to host the distribution channel selection, writing guidance, and audience selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Support for static and adaptive policy scopes for auto-apply retention labels targeting SITs in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: Auto-apply retention labels targeting sensitive information types in Exchange will now support static include/exclude and adaptive policy scopes. Previously admins could only target all Exchange mailboxes.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Potential high impact user experience enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: We will make some minor experience changes for when a user has been detected as a potential high impact user whose activities may lead to potential data security incidents. These changes will include improving accessibility and providing more prominent highlighting of the reasons for being detected as a potential high impact user. Additionally, we will provide additional descriptors regarding how the risk score booster is applied to the user. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence | customer managed storage
CurrentVersion.description: In the alerts triage & incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Compliance Manager: Microsoft Defender for Cloud (MDC) integration
CurrentVersion.description: Compliance Manager now integrates with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, allowing customers to assess their compliance posture across Microsoft 365, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon Web Services with resource-level testing and cloud-specific guidance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Potential high impact user experience enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
We will make some minor experience changes for when a user has been detected as a potential high impact user whose activities may lead to potential data security incidents. These changes will include improving accessibility and providing more prominent highlighting of the reasons for being detected as a potential high impact user. Additionally, we will provide additional descriptors regarding how the risk score booster is applied to the user.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Expanded reactions in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
We're expanding the
set of reactions available in all instances of Viva Engage. Users will see
an additional 24 icons on top of the 6 we already offer. These new icons cover
a wide range of emotions and sentiments, helping users express themselves and
improve engagement in your network. This has launched and is being removed from the roadmap.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Admin setting to disable private messages in a Viva Engage (Yammer) network
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins will have the ability to turn off private message capabilities in their Viva Engage (Yammer) network. Once turned off, users will not see the feature in the frontend. 

Once released, this setting is available for admins to use any time. If turning off private messages in existing networks, users will lose access to their messages. All content remains ingested and available via eDiscovery.  This item has launched and is being removed from the roadmap.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize folders in your sidebar
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message reminders
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is being cancelled as service team has deprecated this feature. When Outlook identifies that a user could have forgotten to respond to or follow up on an email message, it could bring that email back to the top of the inbox, marking it needing an action. A maximum of one email message can be brought to the top of the user's inbox at a time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra:  Microsoft Entra ID - Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules. Note: The month and status have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Microsoft Endpoint DLP Support for Windows on ARM (ARM64)
CurrentVersion.description:
This roadmap item is cancelled. We apologize for any inconvenience. 
With this capability, customers can extend Microsoft Endpoint Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies and actions to endpoints running Windows on ARM (ARM64) which allows them to detect and protect sensitive data in files part of their digital ecosystem. This allows admins to introduce policy controls for scenarios such as when an information worker using a Windows endpoint powered by ARM64 chipset is accessing sensitive files and performing an exfiltration action such as copying to a USB, or copy to clipboard, notepad, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Consumer Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.  this feature has been delivered but is not in scope for the commercial roadmap and is being removed to reduce confusion.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  A new item will be published in the future for the commercial customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint
- Document is unscannable
- Document didn't complete scanning
- Document name matches patterns
- Document size equals or is greater than

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Loop components in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: Tap into the real-time, online collaborative solution provided by Loop directly within the powerful multimodal OneNote canvas—the opportunities are endless. You can create or insert Loop components into your OneNote notebook. Navigate to Insert > Loop to create a new component or try pasting a link to an existing component to have it show up in your OneNote canvas.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Drag to order list items
CurrentVersion.description: Easily organize your list in the Microsoft Lists app by dragging and dropping items into a custom sort order for you and your team.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to Viva App Bar
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint displays Viva App Bar for improved discoverability of other Viva Apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for learner record sync (LRS)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Trainable Classifiers in Server Side Auto-labeling
CurrentVersion.description: Trainable Classifiers are now available for server side auto-labeling policies in exchange, OneDrive and SharePoint. In addition to the 15 Classifiers that are already available, we have now launched 23 more Trainable Classifier to detect sensitive content such as IP and Trade Secrets, sensitive documents pertaining to important business functions such as Finance, Sales, HR, and Material Non Public Information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history within the Purview Audit feature will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Show online archive storage in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: With this latest update, users can now easily view their online archive storage directly within the Outlook application. By displaying online archive storage information, users can proactively manage their email storage and make informed decisions about archiving, cleaning, and their regular and archived folders. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies.  This includes minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
CurrentVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat by clicking "Upload" in the ContextIQ interface.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files to ground prompts in Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files for grounding prompts in Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Copilot Adoption Community
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new capabilities in Engage that will help organizations with their M365 Copilot rollout and adoption journey by bringing together employees in a community of practice. This community will provide a place for employees to ask questions, seek support from both their peers and IT admins, share best practices, and learn more from articles and quick tips on how best to use Copilot. This templatized Copilot adoption community will take away much of the work from the community manager with a set-up checklist, suggested content, suggested members (based on Copilot license assignment), and other features like conversation starters and top Q&As to help with community member engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Zoom meetings with an ID and passcode from a Teams room on Android
CurrentVersion.description:
Teams Rooms on Android can now join Zoom meetings with an ID and a passcode, provided the IT admin has enabled Direct Guest Join meetings for the room. Learn about how to enable Teams Rooms devices to join third-party meetings at the link below.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/rooms/third-party-join

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enhancements to the Text web part
CurrentVersion.description: New features coming to the Text web part include enhancements to styling/formatting, bullets/numbered lists, and tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook themes generated by Microsoft Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Make Outlook yours with themes generated by Copilot. You will be able to find these themes in Settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy support for additional external content
CurrentVersion.description: This feature includes the ability to support external content including Copilot Lab resources

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplifying the personal app header
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams personal apps will start showing a new simplified header bar on Microsoft Teams desktop and web clients. With this change, the "About" tab and other utility actions will be moved to the overflow menu. In addition, the "Chat" tab will be moved to a right-hand side panel for apps that support it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab support for role-based prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to filter Microsoft-authored prompts in Copilot Lab to view those that are associated with a specific job role category, e.g., Marketing, HR, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab is now available in Teams on iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Explore and use suggested Copilot prompts in Copilot Lab in the Teams app on iOS and Android.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Graph API - Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Intune policy available for specific primary account in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This adds Intune policy in the new Outlook for Windows to a specific primary account based on Active Directory Primary SMTP address. This will ease the setup process for new managed devices and guarantee that company policies will always be respected. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: OneNote Copilot on Mac
CurrentVersion.description: OneNote Copilot on Mac is your intelligent assistant, transforming the way you interact with your notes. With simple natural language commands, Copilot helps you understand, summarize, and rewrite notes for enhanced clarity and purpose. It’s designed to work seamlessly on the Mac, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on Mac is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
CurrentVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Introducing content pane
CurrentVersion.description: The content pane is a new place for relevant panes that help authors create their publications. With the introduction of this centralized location, a new toolbox will help authors quickly browse and add content to create rich and engaging pages. The content pane will include additional panes such as configuration tools and design ideas. Within Viva Amplify, the content pane is used to host the distribution channel selection, writing guidance, and audience selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Easier to find your most recent templates
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the Viva Amplify template display include showing the most recently modified templates on the campaign overview page for easy access and separating the Viva Amplify provided templates from the user-saved campaign templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Video templates
CurrentVersion.description: Create and highlight videocentric publications, like meeting content or executive messages, with the new video templates in Viva Amplify; this presents videos that are inline, playable, and beautiful.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Improved authoring experience
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the Viva Amplify editors for both Outlook and Teams distribution channels to improve previewing and editing. These updates will provide improvements to load time and create a coherent audience selection experience across the channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Avatar interaction improvements in Immersive space view
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing more avatar reactions and personal boundary on avatars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show/hide discover feed
CurrentVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent meeting recap with AI-generated notes and tasks for GCC environments
CurrentVersion.description: Enabling AI-generated notes and tasks within the intelligent meeting recap experience for GCC customers, expanding on the features within intelligent recap that are already available to GCC customers today (personalized timeline markers, speaker timeline markers, chapters, and topics).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Digital signage on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can view dynamic, engaging, and relevant content on the Teams Rooms front-of-room display when the device is not in use. Admins can remotely configure tenant-wide and room-specific digital signage settings at scale from Teams Rooms Pro Management. Integrations with selected third-party digital signage providers and content management systems are supported, initial partners are Appspace and XOGO. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro license customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text and UI resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the size of the text and all other UI elements on the front-of-room display by changing the display scaling settings. Text and UI elements are resized and adjusted for all supported display resolution and scaling combinations (1080p resolution at 100-150% scaling, 4K resolution at 100-300% scaling). This capability is extended to support touch boards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt with a coworker
CurrentVersion.description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Lab, inspiring your co-workers to acheive more with Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - New and trending prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Keep track of new and trending prompts in your organization in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
CurrentVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use sensitivity labels in Microsoft 365 apps when connected experiences are disabled
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now disable connected experiences for privacy concerns without impacting data security policies such as sensitivity labels. Services associated with Microsoft Purview (e.g. sensitivity labels and rights management) are no longer controlled by policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps. Instead, these services will rely on their existing security admin controls in Purview portals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Chrome (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meetings experience with performance improvements will be available for anonymous users who join Teams meetings on web in Chrome browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Performance improvements for anonymous users who join meetings in Edge
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meetings experience with performance improvements will be available for anonymous users who join Teams meetings on web in Edge browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SharePoint Embed Support for Teams town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now embed Teams town halls in the SharePoint sites they manage. This capability allows town hall attendees to watch the event instance within a particular SharePoint site.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
CurrentVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Quick Links Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature helps tenant admins add a card with a list of curated quick links for users on the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Barriers v2 support for all new onboarding customers
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Barriers v2 (IB v2) is now available for all new onboarding customers. IB v2 has enhanced architecture which enables the following new features:

Large-scale segment support: The segment limit in organizations has increased to 5,000.
Multi-segment support: Users can be assigned to up to 10 segments.
Flexible user discoverability: Organizations can now choose to allow IB-protected users to discover each other while adhering to IB communication and collaboration policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. It brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project for the web into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Import and export support for data files in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: This feature adds support for importing PST files into Outlook for Mac. Support for OLM data files will include both importing and exporting data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Open locked records as read only
CurrentVersion.description: Files with retention labels marking them as locked records will now open as read only to prevent user edits.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Passkey authentication in brokered Microsoft apps on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra ID users can now use a passkey to sign into Microsoft apps on Android devices where an authentication broker like Microsoft Authenticator or Microsoft Intune Company Portal is installed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows will provide native Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) controls for connected cameras that support this capability. The feature will initially contain limited support for cameras with mechanical/optical PTZ, with digital PTZ to come in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
CurrentVersion.description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with.
News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights- Copilot for Sales Metrics & PBI Report
CurrentVersion.description: Providing Copilot for Sales metrics for Viva Insights analysts in Advanced insights. Copilot for Sales adoption PBI report to provide a starter template to explore Copilot for Sales adoption across the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive colored folders in File Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: A user will be able to view and manage OneDrive colored folders within Windows File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User uploaded custom background images for the new VDI solution for Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: If users want to change what appears behind them in their video meeting or call, they can either blur their background, use Teams virtual background templates, or with a Teams Premium license, they can change their Teams meeting background to a branded logo or image specific to their company. With this new feature, now users on the new VDI solution for Teams can also replace their background entirely with any image they want by uploading it through the 'Video effects and Settings' option.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document name matches patterns, document size equals or is greater than, document Property Is, and document name contains words or phrases.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap for GCC High environment
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap uses AI to provide a quick summary of your meeting, highlighting key discussion points, identifying follow-up actions, and offering quick access to significant points such as name mentions, when a screen was shared, individualized speaker markers, topics, and chapters.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap for GCC High environment
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap uses AI to provide a quick summary of your meeting, highlighting key discussion points, identifying follow-up actions, and offering quick access to significant points such as name mentions, when a screen was shared, individualized speaker markers, topics, and chapters.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Additional formatting options in Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: In response to feedback from you, our customers, we are adding support for even more formatting options when composing in Outlook for iOS or Android! You will be able to choose font size and color, set a default font, as well as clearing and painting formatting.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner app for the web
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app for the web is a single, unified work management experience. Assisted by AI, it brings together the simplicity of Microsoft To Do, the collaboration of Planner, and the power of Microsoft Project into a simple, scalable, intelligent solution that spans from individual task management to enterprise and professional project management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 team is working on supporting 12 new languages across all M365 Copilot features: Bulgarian?, Croatian?, Estonian?, Greek?, Indonesian?, Latvian?, Lithuanian?, Romanian?, Serbian (Latin)?, Slovak?, Slovenia,? and Vietnamese. They're also improving the handling of these language variants: Dutch (Belgium), German (Switzerland), English (UK), Spanish (Mexico), and French (Canada).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When attending a meeting in a Teams Rooms on Windows, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available as long as the meeting organizer is not a designated resource account. This feature is available Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content and use whiteboards and other tools together in the virtual environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
CurrentVersion.description: For users signed in with an Entra account, Microsoft Copilot will offer enterprise data protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Integration of Glint and Pulse results into Copilot Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rollout out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. View results from responses to surveys initiated from Viva Glint or Viva Pulse directly in the Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: With voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. Voice isolation is an AI based advanced noise suppression feature that eliminates unwanted background noise including other human voices. The technology recognizes your voice profile and ensures only your voice is transmitted. Voice isolation can be enabled for calls and meetings and will now be available on MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Labels in grid view
CurrentVersion.description: Labels for your tasks will be shown in grid view in a new Labels column in basic plans. You can get a better overview of your tasks at a glance since you will no longer need to open task details to view labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Education grid view refresh
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams for Education now has a new refreshed grid view, wherein you will directly be able to get to your assignments or classwork for your classes in grid view. This feature will make it easier and faster for you to get to your assignments, classwork or channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Multi-Account Support for Add-Ins and Apps in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, new Outlook for for Windows supports apps and add-ins for the user's primary account only. We will be enabling apps and add-ins to be supported across all of the accounts added to new Outlook, dynamically switching to the active identity. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to filter meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Design Ideas
CurrentVersion.description: Authors can now use Design Ideas in Microsoft Viva Amplify to rearrange and reformat their image section, text section, and banner webpart.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Auto-reading emails with Narrator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users utilizing the Windows Narrator screen reader tool to have messages read aloud automatically after opening the email. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex – simple document processing model
CurrentVersion.description: A prebuilt model that uses OCR and AI to detect the primary language of the file, key-value pairs, tables, selection marks, and barcodes. As with other models, it can be configured to extract this information to specified library columns.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts
CurrentVersion.description: Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Integration with Power Automate
CurrentVersion.description:
Currently in public preview, Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Integration with Power Automate (GCC-High and DoD)
CurrentVersion.description:
Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
